1.1.name: wordpress/kalins-easy-edit-links
1.1.description:
Adds a customizable box to your edit screens with links and edit buttons for all pages, posts, tags, categories, attachments, links and custom post types for convenient linking.

This plugin contains a self-caching feature so that the HTML code does not need to be recompiled every time the box is displayed, making it surprisingly light-weight.

Plugin by Kalin Ringkvist at http://kalinbooks.com/

Plugin URL: http://kalinbooks.com/easy-edit-links-wordpress-plugin/

If you have any problems, please contact me through the above link and I will do my best to resolve the issue.
